history.proof: intros l t1 t2 Hl1 Hl2. apply build_comp with (l1 := l) (l2 := l). - apply Hl1. - apply Hl2. - reflexivity. - hauto l: on depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat

Goal:
forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), build l t1 -> build l t2 -> weight_tree f t1 = weight_tree f t2

Premises:
Inductive build : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := build_one : forall t : btree A, build [t] t | build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t Arguments build _%list_scope Arguments build_step _ (_ _)%list_scope
weight_tree : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> btree A -> nat
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
build_comp : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), build l1 t1 -> build l2 t2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2 -> same_sum_leaves f l1 l2 -> weight_tree f t1 = weight_tree f t2
cover_in_inb : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t2 t1
cover_in_inb_inb : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1
weight_tree_list_node : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f (node t1 t2 :: l) = sum_leaves f t1 + sum_leaves f t2 + weight_tree_list f (t1 :: t2 :: l)
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
inb_antisym : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t1 -> t1 = t2
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P [t] t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P [t] t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
build_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
build_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
subst_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> P [t1] [t2] t1 t2) -> (forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> P l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)) ->...-> P l l0 b b0
subst_pred_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> P [t1] [t2] t1 t2) -> (forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> P l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)) ->...-> P l l0 b b0
cover_node : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
subst_pred_id : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred [t1] [t2] t1 t2
build_cover : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), build l t -> cover l t
inb_trans : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t3 -> inb t1 t3
build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t
height_pred_weight : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> n * sum_leaves f t + weight_tree f t = prod2list f ln l
number_of_nodes_inb_le : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> number_of_nodes t1 <= number_of_nodes t2
ordered_cover_node : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> ordered_cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = [node t1 t2] \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
subst_pred_ordered_cover_l : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l1 t1
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
subst_pred_ordered_cover_r : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l2 t2

```coq
intros l t1 t2 Hl1 Hl2.
apply build_comp with (l1 := l) (l2 := l).
- exact Hl1.
- exact Hl2.
- reflexivity.
- apply same_sum_leaves_refl.
Qed.```
